statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} -1 \\ 3 \\ 2 \\ 1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 1 \\ 3 \\ 2 \\ 1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 1 \\ -9 \\ -6 \\ -3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ -21 \\ -14 \\ -7 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 10 \\ -60 \\ -40 \\ -20 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ 24 \\ 16 \\ 8 \end{array}\right]\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
